ValidationRule.description: NICC-056090;NICC-056595 A user is not allowed to manually change the Status of an Internal Project if the "Approved" checkbox is unchecked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Commercial_Operation_Projects", Approved__c = FALSE, $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", ISCHANGED(Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "In Progress") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This project has not been approved. “In Progress” is not a valid Status for this project. Please see your project sponsor to get the project approved.
